thirdBlock.title: Gas detection system
descriptions: Because of the high H2S levels detected when drilling, testing, performing workover and production operations, hydrogen sulfide is a serious problem in the oil and gas industry.

We are professionals in the early detection of common toxic and explosive gases encountered at petroleum facilities including H2S, SO2, CO, CO2 and CH4. Our advanced gas detection systems provide early gas detection, public address and data collection by recording on all gas detection devices.

When working in a toxic gas environment, the use of gas detection systems is a vital precaution. Gas detection systems focus on early warning of low gas concentrations in the air, allowing site personnel to react immediately and leave the hazardous area before gas concentrations reach lethal levels.

fourthBlock.title: ISO standards
descriptions: Over last 10 years the company has been successfully maintaining international standards such as ISO 9001 for quality management system, ISO 45001 for health and safety management system and ISO 14001 for environmental management system.
We make continuous efforts to improve integrated environmental management and reduce emissions, effectively managing and controlling major environmental risks.
